title: The ADC's reaction...
body:
...when the support accidentally takes a CS or a kill.

http://38.media.tumblr.com/00752fc6975c3d1bff316092f6ecc173/tumblr_nw1j0iCaBn1s2yegdo1_400.gif

PS I made it to gold last night baby. Hop on the SEJ train.

replies.body: Not with my girlfriend. She rages when the adc takes a minion that she goes to kill with her relic proc, especially a cannon
I personally do that too, that's the most pissing thing about being a support {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
They take my cannon minion I just start taking the whole wave.

I rage as support too, but it usually goes something like this:

{{champion:8}} WILL... YOU... LET... ME... FINALLY, THANK YOU!
{{champion:51}} ... ... You just missed the last-hit...
{{champion:8}} I... wait a second...
{{champion:51}} ...
{{champion:8}} ... ... well... MAYBE IF YOU WOULD LET ME PRACTICE MORE!
{{champion:51}} WHY ARE YOU RELIC VLAD SUPPORT??!!
{{champion:8}} DON'T CHANGE THE SUBJECT!
I do that too lol.  Whenever I'm playing in voice chat with friends they know to let me have siege minions with relic or I tilt off the face of the Earth.

My girlfriend doesnt do that.
She bitches at me for playing league more than i want to spend time with her XD

Oh deer.
LoL is fun, but you have to be with her more often doe
SHIT I DROPPED MY PUNS I GOT THEM NO HELP NEEDED
Meanwhile the ganker behind still did the most of damage and tanking xD

Then your team decides not to put up with their shit

http://media.tumblr.com/539fa6f871fe143aa99ee798e1eeefb7/tumblr_inline_mqw255DujI1qz4rgp.gif

The band Steam Powered Giraffe. A steampunk-pantomime group, they act like robots while singing and playing songs.

Example:

http://stream1.gifsoup.com/view6/4730220/steam-powered-giraffe-o.gif

Example 2:

http://i.imgur.com/X1sr7EC.gif?noredirect
Interesting, I shall have to investigate further.
Oh NO!!! 20g GONE IM GONNA FEED.
That apologetic little pet just before being mauled. q-q
